notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: DSA: As a Principle Investigator (PI), guided through the experimental design and data analysis . HS: Performed the experimental work and drafted the manuscript. YK: Guided in performing the the in vivo experimentation and in vitro cytotoxic activity against cell lines. VKG: Carried out the histopathological examination and its interpretation. All authors have read and approved the manuscript.
